description.en: My first ever manga and is a joke manga will only get updated whenever i feel like it and will only consist of one panel every chapters

altTitles.ja: ヤンキー高校にお嬢様

description.en:
Kiryuuin Yuri, a rich young lady, transfers to Mitsuya Private High School, a den of delinquents.

Her goal is to meet real delinquents and have heated one-on-one fights, like those in the delinquent manga she adores. However, contrary to her ideal, the reality is that she is surrounded by "trash" who are too presumptuous to even be called delinquents...

Bullies who rule the class, voyeurs who infest the train to school, abusive breeder in the neighborhood. 

A new refreshing action series begins as this lovely young lady beats up the scums in order to reach the top─!
description.ja: 悪名高い超不良高校に転校してきたのは可憐なお嬢様！？

description.en: What’s worse than someone who leaves you on read? How about someone who doesn’t know when to end the conversation? Mira Hexen is cursed to always be the last one to reply for a whole year or she will be turned to stone. But that’s a bit difficult when you’re the chief of a company that produces a massively successful messaging device. Mira’s latest VIP client is Euryx Deyra, an extremely friendly duke who feels the need to respond to every little thing she says. If only she could just tell him to shut up already...!
description.pl: Co może być gorsze niż ktoś, kto zostawia cię na odczytanej wiadomości? A co powiesz na kogoś, kto nie wie, kiedy zakończyć rozmowę? Mira Hexen jest przeklęta, aby zawsze odpowiadać jako ostatnia przez cały rok, w przeciwnym razie zostanie zamieniona w kamień. Ale to trochę trudne, gdy jest się szefem firmy, która produkuje odnoszące ogromne sukcesy urządzenie do przesyłania wiadomości. Najnowszym klientem VIP Miry jest Euryx Deyra, niezwykle przyjazny książę, który czuje potrzebę odpowiadania na każdą drobną rzecz, którą ona odpisuje. Gdyby tylko mogła powiedzieć mu, żeby się zamknął...!

description.en: Koo Gyo-beom, the only grandson of Chairman Koo Dae-han—who built the Koo Group from the Koo crime syndicate—and the heir to the Koo Group empire, and Hong Cha Yoon, the granddaughter of Shin Ok-chun, a woman working in the kitchen of Hyeonhamwon (the Koo family estate), were as different as heaven and earth. Yet, they harbored good feelings toward each other. "Didn't your father say that you need to know how to handle people? That's why I just used you for practice," said Cha Yoon—until she got caught eavesdropping on a conversation between Gyo-beom and his father. Six years later, the two reunited at Chairman Koo Dae-han’s funeral. From the moment they met again, Gyo-beom persistently began to pursue her. “Begging... I’m begging you right now. Just look at me.” Why is this man acting this way?

After an unexpected accident, I was reborn in another world. 

Could I be the emperor's daughter? Or perhaps a duke's daughter? With a heart full of anticipation, I opened my eyes, and what I saw before me was...

A white, soft puppy's front paw.

Given this situation, I need to find a way to survive. The only thing possible with this small, insignificant puppy body is... 

The path of a lapdog, cozying up to those in power!
description.ko:
예기치 못한 사고를 당하고 다른 세계에서 환생했다.

혹시 나 황제의 딸인가? 아니면 공작의 딸?두근거리는 마음으로 눈을 뜨자 눈앞에 있는 건...

하얗고 말랑한 강아지의 앞발.

이렇게 된 이상 살길을 찾아야 한다. 작고 하찮은 강아지의 몸으로 가능한 단 하나의 일 그것은 바로…

권력자에게 딸랑이는 간신견의 길!

title.en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.ja: つれないほど青くて あざといくらいに赤い

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.en: So Cold That It's Blue, and Cunning Enough to Be Red

altTitles.es-la: Tan frío como el azul y tan agresivo como el rojo

altTitles.vi: Xanh đến nỗi Lạnh Lùng, Đỏ tới mức Xảo Quyệt

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

description.en:
She grew up an orphan, working herself to death in part-time jobs, and eventually died from exhaustion. 

Right before her death, she was reading an R-rated romance fantasy novel and found herself reincarnated as Annette Ethelred, the twisted villainess who was adopted into a duke's family and was bent on killing the novel's heroine. Annette was also the last princess of a fallen kingdom. Her happiness over the lavish lifestyle of the duke’s family didn’t last long, as she was quickly thrown out with nothing to her name, punished for the evil deeds of the original Annette. 

But giving up wasn’t an option. With the survival skills honed from all her part-time jobs, she managed to get hired as a maid at the temple. 

"This time around, I’ll make lots of money and date a handsome man! ...But seriously, are there no normal guys around here?!"

"Let’s have a child.”
“Do you know how babies are made?”
This is how the uneasy marital relationship that devours each other began.

Seung-jae, the grandson of the group and in competition for successor,
enters into a contract marriage with Yeon-woo, who grew up as the hidden daughter of a chaebol. She was chosen because he thought she was the best partner to obey his words and maintain a superficial marital relationship, but after marriage they began to seep into each other little by little. However, the two people are unable to completely open up to each other, misunderstanding each other, and the conflict deepens. Yeon-woo, who was trying to continue her marriage for Seung-jae, decides to end this marriage for him, and discovers the clues to the terrible incident in the chaebol family hidden behind the two people's marriage...

title.en: A Thousand Ways For Her to Take Revenge

description.en:
' My fiancé who betrayed me, my family who stole everything from me...'

I swore that I would never forgive them even in death. I cursed myself to the point of breaking apart. Did that wish come true? "Lilith, wake up! you have to get ready to leave!" i travelled back in time before my parents passed away!

"Who are you?" "My name is Lilith." I won't repeat my mistakes in this life. Those who trampled on me and belittle me in my past life... I will make them all pay. because now, I'm the one in charge.

title.en: Osananajimi no S-kyuu Party kara Tsuihou sareta Seijuutsukai.: Bannou Shien Mahou to Nakama wo Fuyashite Saikyou e!

altTitles.en: The Beast Tamer Was Fired From His Childhood Friends' S-Rank Party

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染のS級パーティーから追放された聖獣使い。万能支援魔法と仲間を増やして最強へ！

description.en:
From MangaUpdates:

A beast tamer without a familiar, Lock had been supporting his friends in an S Rank party until they finally decided to use him as a decoy and abandoned him. After a conversation with the Fenrir his party was attacking, it chose to serve him as his familiar. By using and expanding the [Mini Monster Garden], Lock gathers more and more familiars to form the strongest- and cutest- party ever. Behold, a fantasy where men and beasts go on adventures together.

title.en: The Duke of Death and His Maid

altTitles.fr: Le duc de la Mort et sa gouvernante obscure

altTitles.ru: Смертоносный герцог и его черная горничная

altTitles.ar: النبيل الشاب حاصد الأرواح و خادمته السوداء

altTitles.ja: 死神坊ちゃんと黒メイド

altTitles.en: The Duke of Death and His Black Maid

altTitles.pt-br: O duque da morte e sua empregada

description.en:
In a large mansion lives a boy, an aristocrat who was cursed by the witch to "let everything he touches die." With him is his maid Alice, who besides serving him, likes to tease him. The boy who is interested in her doesn't mind the teasing, but not being able to touch her is painful!  
  
If they are unable to hold hands, how will their love ever bloom?
description.tr: Hikâye büyük bir malikanede yaşayan kaderi bir cadı tarafından mühürlenen bir çocuk ve onunla beraber yaşayan hizmetçi Alice hakkında; çocuk dokunduğu her şeyi ölüme sürüklerken; Alice ile hiç el ele tutuşamayacak olmalarına rağmen yaşanan inişli çıkışlı bir aşk.

altTitles.ja: 塩田先生と雨井ちゃん

description.en:
A teacher and student romance.  
  
Amai Yayoi, 16 years old.   
A high school girl who puts her heart into expressing her love for Shiota-sensei.  
  
Shiota Tsuguharu, 29 years old.  
A high school teacher who is steadily beginning to accept Amai-chan.
description.ru: Милая и романтическая история любви учителя и его ученицы.

altTitles.ja: イグアナの娘

description.en:
Short story collection including:  
  
1. Iguana no Musume:   
A girl develops a complex about herself after her mother thinks of her as a hideous iguana. Iguana Girl reflects Hagio's own relationship with her mother, and it took her "years to write this story".

2. Catharsis

3. Afternoon Sunshine:
While watching a TV show with her husband, Shouko's world was turning upside down because of her husband's words, "After all, married couples are just strangers."

4. The Pills That Help You Go To School:
On the first day of the second semester of his first year in high school, Katsumi saw his father becoming a word processor and his mother an electric rice cooker.

5. My Friend K:
K transferred to the narrator's school in the summer of his second year of junior high school. A 8-page oneshot showcases the tangle between envy and admiration.

title.en: Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachi dewa Irarenai

altTitles.ja: クマとウサギは友達ではいられない

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachi de wa Irarenai

altTitles.en: Bear and Bunny Cannot Be Friends

altTitles.ja: チャラ男くんと清楚ちゃん

description.en:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.
___
**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

title.en: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.ja: クセ強彼女は床にいざなう

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo ha Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.en: A Quirky Girl is Inviting Me to Bed

description.en: Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on. The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?
description.ja: 一浪して大学に合格した青年・木吉直人。上京のために住める場所を探していたところ、親戚で憧れの姉・月(ルナ)の家で同棲することに。 昔憧れていた月は垢ぬけて、美しく成長し…そして…ビッチになっていた!?夜な夜なあられもない嬌声を聞き、モンモンとする直人。他の男性がいる割に距離感もめちゃくちゃ近い。何を考えているか分からない月に翻弄され、さらに月以外のエッチで癖が強い女の子たちも集まりだし…!?
description.pt-br:
De repente estou morando com a garota mais velha por quem eu tinha uma queda!? Ainda mais, estou começando a suspeitar que ela é uma vagabunda!?

Naoto Kiyoshi é um jovem que acabou de entrar na universidade depois de ser reprovado nos exames de admissão um ano antes. Quando ele estava procurando um lugar para morar para poder se mudar para Tóquio, ele se viu morando com Luna, uma parente e garota mais velha por quem ele tinha uma queda.

A Luna que ele admirava no passado era arrumada, bonita e madura... e agora ela aparentemente se tornou uma vagabunda!? Noite após noite, ele ouve seus gemidos sedutores e pouco femininos, e isso está deixando Naoto excitado. Há também outros homens de quem ela é irracionalmente próxima além dele. Luna, cujos pensamentos ele não conseguia entender, está o levando pelo nariz! Além disso, outras mulheres com peculiaridades obscenas além de Luna também se reuniram lá!?

Este é o início de sua nova vida emocionante cercado por garotas mais velhas safadas(?)!

altTitles.ja: Dededede
デッドデッドデーモンズデデデデデストラクション

description.en:
A series about the lives of two high school girls living in Tokyo after aliens have invaded. Dead Dead Demon's Dededededestruction is a self-styled dystopian slice-of-life that reflects on modern societal and political issues in Japan while still maintaining a sense of humor and frivolity.

Large mysterious alien ships have been looming above Japanese towns for three years, filling the sky. Everything changed three years ago. And yet, nothing has changed.

No weapon used against the invaders' ships had any success, beyond destroying part of Japan and leaving its economy in shambles. JSDF is fighting a guerrilla battle against the aliens all over Japan. America is joining the 'war' effort with more aggressive tactics, dividing Japan over the pacifist principle laid out in Article 9 of the Japanese constitution. But this may just be the mundane story of young high schoolers.

"No matter what happens, I won't back down. At least not until this world filled with lies and deceit crumbles away. The real threat to humankind is not invaders, but me."

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga** 
- **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2022**
description.fr:
Depuis 3 ans, le ciel de Tokyo est recouvert par un gigantesque vaisseau spatial extra-terrestre. Pourtant, aucune attaque de la part des extra-terrestres n’est recensée, bien que les humains abattent, avec une facilité déconcertante, les petits vaisseaux qui sortent de temps en temps du ventre de l’immense engin…

Pendant ce temps, sur Terre, les deux amies Kadode et Ôran, comme la majorité des humains, ne prêtent plus attention à ce vaisseau et continuent à vivre leur vie. Mais ces 3 années de paix ont endormi la vigilance de l’Humanité… Elle ne remarque pas que « l’envahisseur » s’est infiltré au sein de sa population. Et il pourrait bientôt troubler leur paisible quotidien !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**

title.en: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei LoveCome

altTitles.ja: 英雄と魔女の転生ラブコメ

altTitles.ja-ro: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei Rabu Kome

altTitles.en: A Reincarnation Romantic Comedy of a Hero and a Witch

description.en:
Choose the world or choose her. 

Ordinary high school student Shiraishi Godo harbored a "secret"  - he possessed memories of a past life. In a world different from this one, he was a "hero" who saved humanity. 

However, that was a story of his past life. 

In this life, he was supposed to lead an ordinary school life—until the arrival of transfer student Mai Shiina turned everything upside down.
description.ja:
世界を選ぶか、彼女を選ぶか。

平凡な高校生・白石護道には『秘密』があった。それは前世の記憶を持っていること。こことは違う別の世界で、人類を救った『英雄』だった。

とはいえ、あくまで前世の話。

今世ではごく普通の学生生活――のはずだったが、転入してきた少女・椎名麻衣の出現で日々は一変する。

altTitles.ja: ちょびっツ

description.en: Hideki's just like every other guy in the 22nd century. He just wants a good job, a good car, and a sexy robot girlfriend to call his own. Until he lands a job, he'll never be able to afford his own 'Persocom' companion. Hideki's luck changes when he discovers Chi–an adorable but seemingly stupid Persocom–tied up in a pile of trash. His first robot companion turns out to be a lot more responsibility than he expected, and she gets him into quite a few embarrassing situations. It's 'boy-meets-girl' for the cyber age.

altTitles.ja: あいこら

description.en:
Maeda Hachibei is unlike most guys, who lust after gorgeous girls. This pervert lusts after their discrete parts, instead. When he moves to Tokyo to attend school, he finds himself living in a dormitory with five girls, each of which possesses one of the ideal physical features he desires: gorgeous blue eyes, bullet-train breasts, a deep dulcet voice, straight “anime-esque” legs, or a waistline shaped like fine Japanese pottery. How can he manage to keep his wits when surrounded by these women? If you think this sounds like a Love Hina clone, you wouldn’t be entirely incorrect… but Hachibei isn’t Keitaro.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Love & Collage**

altTitles.ja: 履いてください、鷹峰さん

description.en:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

“Become my closet!”

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/please-put-them-on-takamine-san)
description.ja: 生徒会長の鷹峰さんはスクールカーストのトップ中のトップ、神！　対して、友達も存在感も皆無の白田くんはある日、鷹峰さんの生おっぱいを見てしまう。そこから変わるスクールライフ。――「私にパンツを履かせなさい」なんと鷹峰さんは”未だ穢れ知らぬ乙女（エターナル・バージンロード）”という能力でパンツを脱いで時をかける少女だった。ノーパンではいられない鷹峰さんのクローゼットとして白田くんは鷹峰さんにモモ色おねだりをされ続けるハメに…。
description.ru:
Президент студсовета, Такамине-сан находится на самом верху школьной иерархии. Она — практически бог!  
Однажды Широта-кун случайно увидел обнажённую грудь Такамине. С того момента его школьная жизнь изменилась.  
- "Надень мои трусики для меня"   
В итоге Широта-кун оказался в стеснительном положении из-за розовых пристрастий Такамине-сан.  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuichi_hiiragi)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/2056601)  
- [Official Page (JP)](https://magazine.jp.square-enix.com/joker/series/takamine/)
description.pt-br:
A presidente do conselho estudantil, Takamine-san, está no topo da hierarquia escolar, uma deusa! Um dia, Shirota-kun acidentalmente vê os seios nus de Takamine-san. A partir de então, sua vida escolar mudou, sendo chantageado para uma vida de servidão a Takamine-san. ― “Coloque minha calcinha para mim”
Shirota-kun acabou em uma situação difícil devido aos favores cor-de-rosa de Takamine-san.

altTitles.ja: シーザス
復活殺手JESUS

description.en:
The criminal underworld speaks of a hitman bearing incredible skill...this man goes by the name "Jesus." Why, you ask? Because it happens to be last word to escape the lips of any fool unfortunate enough to be caught on the wrong end of his gun.

Internationally wanted hitman, codenamed Jesus, fakes his death using the body of his exact double, high school teacher Shingo Fujisawa. A much bigger problem is at play, as Fujisawa's family is unaware of his death (via cardiac arrest), leading to Jesus taking up the name and profession of his much more legally-sound doppelganger. When the mafia and international agents start showing up in Japan, Jesus must do everything in his power to keep his newfound family, peers, and students safe, all while his opponents pray for mercy!


----

Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **J**

title.en: The Grown Dog Bullies Its Owner

altTitles.th: เจ้าสุนัขตัวโตรังแกเจ้านายอีกแล้ว

description.en:
[Black-bellied top student x Two-faced school grass]
"You there, be mine!"

School grass Xia Zhixing, unwilling to reveal his identity as a streamer, borrows the face of the mysterious top student Lin Lang.

Unexpectedly, the student that resembled a cute little puppy had actually desired him for a long time...

"Senior, the reward I want is you."

altTitles.ja: ディザインズ

description.en:
Beyond the natural world lies a breed of abnormal beings... “H.A.”, or “Humanized Animals”. They are a hybrid of human and animal, "designed" at the genetic level. 
Possessing astonishing physical capabilities, these H.A. are deployed into scenes of intrigue by certain ambitious individuals, seeking to showcase their true value. 

For what purpose did humans design these beings? Behind it all lies a grand plan connected to the future of humanity!

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

altTitles.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.ja: 甘神さんちの縁結び

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.vi:
Được thực hiện bởi phụ tá của Negi Haruba và được chính tác giả của Gotou-bun khuyến khích xem thử. Từ Oneshot nay đã có series và được đông đảo mọi người đón nhận
Uryuu Kamihate chuyển đến Kyoto và tình cờ sống chung với 3 chị em Miko trong một ngôi đền. Tuy vậy cậu lại là một người không tin vào thần linh mà chỉ tin tưởng bản thân mình, chuyện gì sẽ xảy đến với Uryuu khi xung quanh cậu là 3 chị em vu nữ xinh đẹp đây?
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.
description.pt-br: Kamihate Uryuu, órfão desde a infância, recebe um convite para ficar no santuário xintoísta local. Tudo o que ele queria era um lugar tranquilo para estudar, para que pudesse realizar seu sonho de entrar para uma faculdade de medicina de ponta, mas depois de chegar lá, ele se depara com três belas irmãs donzelas do santuário... E o sacerdote chefe pede que ele se case com uma delas e assuma o santuário. Uma história de amor e milagres está prestes a se desenrolar!

altTitles.ja: こむぎが自慢のパン屋さん

altTitles.en: The Bakery That Komugi is Proud Of

description.en:
Komugi is a cat who has been reborn as a human, so that she can repay the love and kindness she received from Honami, the girl who was her owner in her past life. When she shows up at her old home, she learns that Honami has become the owner of a bakery. She inherited the bakery from her father, but things aren't going well and the bakery is practically empty of customers every day...

Komugi makes a proposal to Honami who worries that she'll have to close up shop:
"Please let me work here!"

It's a workplace comedy that unfolds in a small bakery located at the end of a side street off the main road!!

(Source: Gangan Online)
description.ja:
前世で自分を可愛がってくれた少女・穂奈実に恩返しをするため人間に生まれ変わった猫のこむぎ。昔住んでいた家を訪れてみたら穂奈実はパン屋さんの店長になっていた。先代から店を受け継いだもののうまくいかず閑古鳥が鳴く毎日…。店を閉めようかと悩んでいた穂奈実に、こむぎはひとつの提案をする。「私をここで働かせてください」
大通りの脇道の奥にある小さなパン屋さんで繰り広げられるお仕事コメディー!!

altTitles.ja: ベノム 求愛性少女症候群

altTitles.es: Venom: Síndrome de las Chicas que Buscan Amor

description.en:
Loneliness is like poison, I have nothing, I'm a failure, I'm a failure, and so on... In a social networking site where girls vent their pain, she comes across a rumor of "Courtship Girl Syndrome," which only teenage girls are affected by. She thought it was just a myth, a disease with a cute name and symptoms like those of a manga character. However, the abnormalities that began to occur in the girl's body as a result of a certain problem are very similar to the rumors...?

We are affected by the blue spring disease.
description.es: Venom, Darling Dance, Failure Girl y otras famosas canciones de la popular vocaloid P, Kairiki Bear, han sido convertidas en "Historias". ¡La soledad es como el veneno, no tengo nada, soy un fracaso, soy una fracasada, etc.! En una red social donde la chica desahoga su dolor, se topa con el rumor del "Síndrome de las chicas que buscan amor", que solo afecta a las adolescentes. Pensó que era solo un mito, una enfermedad con un nombre bonito y síntomas como los de un personaje de manga. Sin embargo, las anomalías que empezaron a producirse en el cuerpo de la chica como consecuencia de cierto problema son ¿muy parecidas a los rumores...? Estamos afectadas por la enfermedad de la primavera azul.
description.id:
Venom, Dari Dance, Failure Girl, dan lagu-lagu terkenal lainnya oleh vokaloid populer P, Kairiki Bear, telah diubah menjadi "Cerita"!

Kesepian sama seperti racun, aku tidak punya apa-apa, aku gagal, aku gagal, dan seterusnya... Di situs jejaring sosial tempat para gadis melampiaskan rasa sakit mereka, dia menemukan rumor "Sindrom Gadis Berpacaran," yang hanya berpengaruh pada gadis remaja.
Dia pikir itu hanya mitos, gejala penyakit dengan nama yang imut seperti karakter manga. Namun, kelainan yang terjadi di tubuh gadis itu sangat mirip dengan rumor...?
Kami terjangkit penyakit musim semi biru.
description.ja: 「孤独って毒みたい」「私には何も無い」「自分は失敗作だから」―― そんな苦しさを吐き出すためのSNSの裏アカで少女が目にしたのは、10代の女子だけが発症するという『求愛性少女症候群』の噂。カワイイ名前にマンガのキャラクターみたいな症状でできているそんな病、ただの作り話だと思っていた。 けれど、ある悩みをきっかけに少女の身体に起き始めた異常は、その噂とよく似ていて――？私たちは、青い春の病に侵されている。

altTitles.ja: シブヤニアファミリー

description.en: A small series that frankly depicts the circumstances of a third-grade girl living in Shibuya and her family.
description.ja:
渋谷に住む小３女子とその家族の事情を赤裸々に描く小型連載。
最後に書いてある「しぶや係日誌」も見てね。

title.en: Boukensha ni Narenakatta Ore, Skill [Oppai Kyousei] de Nayameru Anoko wo Hitotasuke!?

altTitles.ja: 冒険者になれなかった俺、スキル「おっぱい矯正」で悩めるあの子を人助け!?

altTitles.en: I Couldn't Become an Adventurer, so I'll Help Troubled Girls with My [Breast Correction] Skill!?

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since dungeons suddenly appeared on Earth. In a world where people with excellent skills play an active role as adventurers, the skill that high school student Takeshi Miyamoto has discovered is... [Breast Correction]!? Takeshi is confused by the unique skill he has never seen or heard of. But there seems to be a surprising number of girls who need it...?
___
**Links:**
- Web Novel Raw Link - [https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426616946277](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426616946277)
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66639)
description.ja:
大切な人を救うため……今日も俺はおっぱいを揉む！

地球上に突如としてダンジョンが現れてから十余年。優れたスキルを持つ者が冒険者として活躍する世界で、高校生・宮本武が開眼したスキルは……「おっぱい矯正」!? 見たことも聞いたこともない異色のスキルに戸惑う武だったが、それを必要とする女の子は意外にも多そうで――。

title.en: Isekai de Haishin Katsudou wo Shitara Tairyou no Yandere Shinja wo Umidashite Shimatta Ken

altTitles.ja: 異世界で配信活動をしたら大量のヤンデレ信者を生み出してしまった件

altTitles.en: When I Started Streaming in Another World, I Ended Up Creating a Large Number of Yandere Followers

description.en: Living in Ataraxia, a world of swords and magic, a reincarnated individual decided to make a living out of streaming. Living in a world where such a thing did not exist despite the many forms of entertainment, he quickly made a name for himself. This is not the tale of just a streamer... but of a boy who becomes a legend as a haishinsha.
description.ja: 剣と魔法の世界アタラシア――その世界に生きる一人の転生者が配信活動に手を出した。 数多くの娯楽はあれど、そのようなモノが存在しなかった世界で彼はたちまち有名になった。 これは異世界で唯一の配信者……ではなく、ハイシンシャになろうと考えた少年の物語である。
description.vi: Anh nhân vật chính của chúng ta được chuyển sinh sang thế giới có sự tồn tại của ma thuật. Sở hữu trong mình sức mạnh bá ko tả nổi, anh sẽ đánh bại quái vật để kiếm sống ư? Không, anh chê, anh muốn theo đuổi đam mê, anh muốn làm streamer để kiếm sống.

altTitles.ja: 寄生列島

description.en: Sendo Chihiro, a high school girl, moves from Tokyo to the provincial island of Hanayama after her parents' divorce. There's something strange about the island she moves to. There is blatant discrimination against outsiders, mysterious rituals that suddenly take place, and a huge "water tower" built in the middle of the island... One day, a fisherman is stabbed to death in his home. The whole island becomes suspicious of the murderer, and the unexpected culprit is revealed――. A parasite psycho-thriller by Edogawa Edogawa of "Ikenie Touhyou".

Blue Archive GLB's official 4-Koma, featuring snippets of the daily occurrences in Kivotos!

For the Official English and Korean versions, you can find them on the respective server's Twitter account.

The series is titled (Global) to differentiate it from the Japanese 4-Koma.

---
**Links:**
- [Blue Archive EN's Twitter](https://twitter.com/EN_BlueArchive)
- [Blue Archive KR's Twitter](https://twitter.com/KR_BlueArchive)
- [JP Server's 4-Koma](https://mangadex.org/title/1f63ea84-6bc6-4312-81bf-b28d5592d802/blue-archive-japan)

title.en: I, Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits, Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples

altTitles.zh: 天生媚骨的我被病娇徒儿盯上了

altTitles.zh-ro: Tiansheng Meigu De Wo Bei Bing Jiao Tu Er Ding Shangle
Tiānshēng Mèigǔ De Wǒ Bèi Bìng Jiāo Tú Er Dīng Shàngle

altTitles.vi: Trời Sinh Mị Cốt, Ta Bị Đồ Nhi Yandere Để Mắt Tới

description.en: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

title.en: Akuma wa Rozario ni Kiss o suru

altTitles.ja: 悪魔はロザリオにキスをする

altTitles.vi: Lên Chuỗi Tràng Hạt, Ác Ma đặt Nụ Hôn

description.en:
Since his childhood, Yoshihiro Yoshinaga has faced countless challenges, distancing himself from the company of others and the possibility of forging friendships due to a persistent problem: being harassed by spirits from an early age.

This constant spectral presence has cast shadows over his life, weaving a web of misfortunes. However, the course of his life takes a drastic turn when a giant demon unexpectedly emerges intent on taking his life. In the midst of this crisis, a chance encounter with Alicia Baal, a beautiful nun residing within a church, becomes the catalyst for a radical transformation to his destiny.
description.ja: 幸彦は幽霊が見えたが、その実態は悪魔だった。ある日、本物の悪魔に遭遇。逃げた先の教会でシスター・アリシアと出会い、悪魔退治の契約を交わす。しかし彼女の正体は、魔王になることを企む「悪魔」だった――！

altTitles.ja: 異世界バトルロイヤル

description.en: A man in armor with the power of darkness, Ares the Dark Knight, was heading to the Demon King's Castle as a member of the Brave Party. Hoping to defeat the Demon King and make a triumphant return to the hometown of Lulua, the hero's wise younger sister... And in the midst of the final battle, just as Ares delivers a dark blow... with signs of being taken somewhere, out of nowhere something takes you to another world. It feels like you've been caught up in a battle royale, in which strong people from various worlds participate!?  To return to the original world with Lulua, who was separated, the dark knight Ares fights.
description.ja: 暗黒騎士アレスは、勇者一行のメンバーとして魔王討伐の最終局面を迎えていた。勝って勇者の妹であり賢者のルルアと結婚するという大願を胸に、アレスが全力解放した闇の一撃を放とうとした刹那・・・何者かの手により異世界に転送され、各世界の強者たちが殺し合いをする異世界バトルロイヤルに巻き込まれてしまう。そして運命的に出会った女子高生シュリの助けを頼りに、この世界を生き抜いていくことになるのだが――。暗黒騎士が、剣と闇の力で斬りまくる！！
description.pt-br: Um homem de armadura com o poder das trevas, Ares o Cavaleiro das trevas,estava indo para o Castelo do Rei Demônio como membro do Brave Party. Com a esperança de derrotar o Rei Demônio e fazer um retorno triunfante à cidade natal de Lulua, a sábia e irmã mais nova do herói… E no meio da batalha final, no momento em que Ares desfere um golpe sombrio… com sinais de estar sendo levado a algum lugar, do nada algo o leva para outro mundo. Parece que você foi pego em uma batalha real, na qual pessoas fortes de vários mundos participam!? Para voltar ao mundo original com Lulua, que foi separada, o cavaleiro das trevas Ares luta. A história de tentar ser o mais forte em outro mundo começa!

altTitles.en: Precarious Female Executive Miss Black General
Precarious Woman Executive Miss Black General

altTitles.ja: 残念女幹部ブラックジェネラルさん

altTitles.es-la: La Precaria Mujer Ejecutiva Señorita General Black

description.en: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
description.es-la: La General Black es la líder de una organización secreta que quiere dominar al mundo. Por desgracia también esta loca por Braveman un superhéroe dedicado a frustrar los malvados planes de esta organización. Entonces, ¿Cómo exactamente va a conquistar el mundo cuando ni siquiera puede conquistar sus propios sentimientos? ¿Y cómo va a responder Braveman a este extraño giro?
description.pt-br: Braveman é um super herói como qualquer outro. Infelizmente pra ele, sua arqui-inimiga é sua stalker e sua fã número 1. Acompanhe as aventuras de Braveman e sua luta incansável contra seu maior adversário enquanto tenta não perder a cabeça.

title.en: Yamiochi Yuusha no Haishin Haishin ~Tsuihousare, Kakushi Boss Beya ni Hourikomareta Kekka, Boss to Tansakushagari Haishin wo Hajimeru~

altTitles.ja: 闇堕ち勇者の背信配信～追放され、隠しボス部屋に放り込まれた結果、ボスと探索者狩り配信を始める～@comic

altTitles.en: Stream of a Betrayed Fallen Hero: As a Result of Being Exiled and Thrown Into a Hidden Boss Room, He Starts Broadcasting Hunting Bosses and Explorers

altTitles.vi: Livestream Sa Ngã của Vị Anh Hùng Bị Ruồng Bỏ~Bị Trục Xuất và Ném Vào Căn Phòng Ẩn, Tôi Bắt Đầu Stream Săn Thám Hiểm Giả Cùng Boss~@comic

description.en:
Fifty years have passed since dungeons first appeared on Earth. Dungeon exploration and live streaming are considered the norm for the people. Kuga, who became a dungeon explorer alongside his close friends, ends up being banished from his party due to him being a supposed "jack of all trades, master of none" hero. Amidst his despair, Kuga finds himself thrown into the hidden boss room, famous for making explorers unable to step foot into a dungeon ever again. There, he encounters a beautiful female vampire named Alicia. Though he’s prepared to meet his end, Alicia, captivated by the so-called streaming, has other plans and asks him, "Could you teach me how to stream?"

With nowhere else to go, Kuga reluctantly accepts her proposal and thus begins their unprecedented dungeon explorer-hunting streams. For some reason, their stream quickly went viral like crazy, and Kuga then began to awaken some unknown powers...? And meanwhile, something strange is happening to the party members who banished Kuga...
description.ja:
追放勇者が、最凶ボスとバディに！？

地球にダンジョンが出現し、ダンジョンの探索や配信が当たり前になった現代。親友らと共に探索者となったクガだったが、“器用貧乏”勇者がゆえにパーティーから追放されてしまう。失意の中、生きては戻れぬと噂の隠しボス部屋に放り込まれるクガ。そこに現れたのは美少女吸血鬼・アリシア。死を覚悟するが、アリシアは人間の配信に興味津々のようで――。
description.vi:
Đã năm mươi năm trôi qua kể từ khi các hầm ngục xuất hiện trên Trái Đất. Khám phá hầm ngục và phát sóng trực tiếp đã trở thành một thói quen đối với mọi người.

Kuga, người đã trở thành thám hiểm gia hầm ngục cùng những người bạn thân, cuối cùng lại bị trục xuất khỏi nhóm vì bị coi là một anh hùng "đa năng nhưng không tinh thông". Trong cơn tuyệt vọng, Kuga bị đẩy vào một phòng trùm bí mật, nổi tiếng là nơi khiến bất kỳ ai từng vào sẽ không bao giờ có thể quay lại hầm ngục nữa. Ở đó, anh gặp một nữ ma cà rồng xinh đẹp tên Alicia.

Dù đã chuẩn bị tâm lý đối mặt với cái chết, Alicia lại bị thu hút bởi ý tưởng phát sóng trực tiếp và đề nghị: "Anh có thể dạy tôi cách phát sóng không?" Không còn nơi nào để đi, Kuga miễn cưỡng chấp nhận đề nghị của cô, và cuộc phiêu lưu stream săn các thám hiểm gia hầm ngục chưa từng có bắt đầu.

Vì lý do nào đó, buổi phát sóng của họ nhanh chóng trở nên nổi tiếng. Đồng thời, Kuga dần dần thức tỉnh một sức mạnh bí ẩn… Và trong khi đó, những điều kỳ lạ bắt đầu xảy ra với những người bạn từng trục xuất anh ta khỏi nhóm...

altTitles.ja: シェパードハウス・ホテル

altTitles.vi: Khách sạn dẫn lối linh hồn

description.en:
In Alberta, Canada, there is a hotel located on the shores of a lake. The hotel, which was the scene of a horrific incident in the past and is surrounded by disturbing rumors, has become a special place that helps souls of the dead move on and finally rest (checkout).

This hotel is called “Shepherd House”. A house of rest that brings healthy relaxation to all souls. And today, another new guest arrives…

---
**Notes:**
- [On hiatus](https://x.com/morikazukisan/status/1786747915152892002)

altTitles.ja: 笑顔のたえない職場です。

altTitles.en: A Workplace Where You Can't Help But Smile

description.en: New shoujo manga artist Nana Futami works hard every day while being supported by Kaede Satou, her female editor who is older than her, and Mizuki Hazama, her assistant. According to the girl herself, she sometimes drums up intense daydream delusions of occupational illness!
description.ja: 新人少女漫画家の双見奈々先生は、年上の女性担当編集者の佐藤 楓さんやアシスタントの間 瑞希さんに支えられながら、時々本人曰く職業病の激しい妄想を拗らせながら、今日もお仕事中！
description.ko: 신인 작가 후타미는 본인이 말하길 망상은 직업병! 이라며 담당 사토 씨와 어시스턴트 하 씨에게 도움을 받으면서 오늘도 열심히 일한다! 만화계에서 일하는 어른의 청춘군상극. 대상 독자는 만화를 사랑하는 모든 사람 입니다.

description.en: My maid, Hayaoka-san, She is serious, good at her job and perfect. But it seems like I'm a little relaxed after work... The gap between on and off keeps me excited! ♡

altTitles.ja: Ueki no Housoku
うえきの法則

description.en:
A group of powerful beings called tenkaijin are holding a special tournament. The rules of the game–each tenkaijin selects a kid in junior high to be his champion and grants him a special power. The kids take each other on in heated battle, but if they hurt innocent bystanders, then they lose one of their natural-given abilities. Every time they win a battle, they gain a new ability. The ultimate winner of the tournament is granted any power of his choosing, and the tenkajin who he represents succeeds in becoming the next god. Kosuke Ueki has been chosen to fight in the tournament. His special power–the ability to turn garbage into trees.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Law of Ueki** (2006)

altTitles.ja: 多重人格探偵サイコ

description.en: The main character is a detective, Kazuhiko Amamiya, suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder (a.k.a. Dissociative Identity Disorder). Starting out as a violent detective series with a twist (the twist being the variant personalities that take over Detective Amamiya at various intervals), the series evolves into an exceptionally complex and involved sci-fi conspiracy story.

title.en: Hazure Hantei kara Hajimatta Cheat Majutsushi Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: ハズレ判定から始まったチート魔術士生活

altTitles.zh: 从废柴判定开始的魔术士人生

altTitles.en: Life as a Cheat Magician that began with a False Judgment

description.en:
One day, all the eighth grade students were transferred to another world.



The princess of the other world summoned them to make up for their lack of strength. The students are threatened and decide to follow the princess, and they are made to take a magical power test to determine their abilities. While everyone is sorted according to their results, Kokubun Kento's result is a flop.

Judged as useless, he is expelled. However, there is actually a tremendous ability lurking within Kento... 

The life-size eighth grader Kento, together with his fellow skeletons, aims to rescue his classmates!

---

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5782dy/) (jp)
description.ja:
ある日、中学２年生の生徒全員が異世界に転移させられた。

異世界の王女が、戦力不足を補うために彼らを召喚したのだ。脅されて王女に従うことにした生徒たちは、能力を調べる魔力判定を受けさせられる。みんなが結果に応じて振り分けられていくなか、国分健人の判定結果はハズレ。

使い物にならないと判断されて、追放されてしまった。だが、健人の内には実は物凄い能力が潜んでいて… 

等身大の中学２年生の健人が、仲間になったスケルトンとともに同級生たちの救出を目指す！

title.en: Isekai de Aisare Sugite Komattemasu! Isekai BL Anthology

altTitles.ja: 異世界で愛されすぎて困ってます！異世界BLアンソロジー

altTitles.en: I'm in Trouble Because I'm Loved So Much in This Different World! Isekai BL Anthology

description.en:
Despite being a misanthropic mage!?? Despite being the best friend of the fallen prince!?? Despite being the villainous son!?? To be adored by the cheat protagonist in another world! The popular BL novel from 'Moonlight Novels' is now in comic form! An otherworldly BL anthology!!

Cover art: Yamamori Potato

**Contents:**
1. "A Deliberate Mage Is Doted Upon by a Holy Knight in a Peaceful World" (陰キャな魔導士は、平和な世界で聖騎士に溺愛される). Art by Yamamori Potato, Story by Ei Enroku. [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n9423ic/)
Shun is reincarnated as a mage in another world. Carrying over his distrust of humans from his past life, he gradually opens his heart as he is adored by the holy knight, Sasha.
2. "I've Been Reincarnated as the Best Friend of the Prince of Darkness" (闇堕ち王子の親友に転生してしまいました). Art by Korotora, Story by Tachibasami. [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n2944id/)
The protagonist is reincarnated as the best friend of the 'prince of darkness' in the RPG world he loved in his previous life. As he tries everything to avoid the prince's fall into darkness, changes start to appear in the prince's demeanor...?
3. "I Was Reincarnated as a Dog, but I'm Still Doing Well" (犬に転生したけど今日も元気です). Art by Mochita, Story by ◇◆◇◆. [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n8433hw/)
Reincarnated as a dog, I was picked up by a handsome prince. The prince adores my fluffy fur, but it turns out I was a beastman...?
4. "The Villainess Only Wanted to Be Betrothed to the Prince at Any Cost, and That Was All" (その悪役令息は、なんとしても王子と婚約したかっただけなのです。ただそれだけだったのです。). Art by Bandou, Story by Tentsubu. [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n1713hw/)
Daen, who was mocked for his ignorance, volunteered to be the prince's fiancé. However, he finds himself being looked at affectionately by Rintz, who should be his rival for the engagement...?!
5. "Even If I'm Reincarnated, I Want to Love Shiba Inu!" (転生しても柴犬を愛でたい！). Art by Yoshizuka Mayako, Story by Yoshihisa Shiba. [Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n4281ic/)
Vilfred, who loves Shiba Inus, finds himself in an otherworld where only Prince Ferdinand owns a Shiba Inu... He has no choice but to get closer to the prince!!
description.ja:
人間不信の魔導士なのに！？ 
闇堕ち王子の親友なのに！？ 
悪役令息なのに！？ 
異世界のチート攻めから溺愛されるなんて！ 

『ムーンライトノベルズ』の大人気BL小説をコミカライズ！異世界BLアンソロジー！！ 

カバーイラスト：山森ぽてと

**第1巻の内容：**
1. 『陰キャな魔導士は、平和な世界で聖騎士に溺愛される』　漫画：山森ぽてと　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n9423ic/)：栄円ろく
魔導士として異世界に転生したシュン。前世での人間不信を引きずっていたが、聖騎士サーシャに溺愛されるうち次第に心を開いてきて──。

2. 『闇堕ち王子の親友に転生してしまいました』　漫画：コロ虎　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n2944id/)：タチバサミ
前世でハマったRPGの世界で「闇堕ち王子」の親友に転生した主人公。闇堕ち回避のために手を尽くしていると王子の様子に変化が…? 

3. 『犬に転生したけど今日も元気です』　漫画：もちた　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n8433hw/)：◇◆◇◆
犬に転生した俺はイケメンの王子に拾われた。王子は俺のもふもふを溺愛してくるのだが、どうやら俺、獣人だったみたい…？ 

4. 『その悪役令息は、なんとしても王子と婚約したかっただけなのです。ただそれだけだったのです。』　漫画：ばんどう　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n1713hw/)：てんつぶ
身の程知らずと罵られながらも王子の婚約者に立候補したダエン。なのに婚約者候補のライバルであるはずのリンツから愛おしそうに見られて…!? 

5. 『転生しても柴犬を愛でたい！』　漫画：よしづかまやこ　[原作](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n4281ic/)：斯波良久
柴犬が大好きなヴィルフレード。しかし転生した異世界では、柴犬を飼っているのはフェルディナンド王子しかおらず...これは王子様とお近づきになるしかないっ！！

altTitles.ja: モブから始まる探索英雄譚

altTitles.zh-hk: 從路人開始的探索英雄譚

altTitles.zh: 从路人开始的探索英雄谭

altTitles.en: The Story of an Exploration Hero Who Has Worked His Way up From Common People

description.en:
Takagi Kaito, a low status high schooler, your typical mob character so to say, was just a normal everyday explorer who hunted slimes every day in the dungeons that appeared in Japan, earning pocket money while admiring his childhood friend, the class queen, from afar. 

One day, a golden slime he had never seen appears before him. After he defeats it, he obtains an extremely rare item worth hundreds of millions as a drop, a servant card that can summon mythical beings!! After he makes up his mind and summons it, a warrior maiden with unparalleled beauty appears. 

Rise above being just a mob explorer Kaito! A modern battle fantasy story has begun!

---

[Web Novel (JP)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8930fk/) 
[Alternative Raw (Niconico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55183)
description.ja: ＜ダンジョン＞にソロで潜り、スライム狩りの毎日を送る男子高校生・高木海斗。そんなある日、変なスライムから時価10億の<サーバントカード>を手に入れる。悩み抜いた末に召喚を選択した海斗のもとに現れたのは神話の戦乙女ヴァルキリーの格好をした幼女シルフィーだった。一度は落胆したものの、シルフィーが最強クラスのスキルを持っている事が判明し…!? モブな探索者から成り上がれ!
description.pt-br: Takagi Kaito, um colegial de baixa estatura, o típico personagem Mob, era um explorador comum que caçava slimes todos os dias nas masmorras que surgiram no Japão, ganhando dinheiro extra enquanto admirava sua amiga de infância, a madona da classe. Um belo dia, um slime dourado que ele nunca tinha visto antes aparece para ele. Depois de derrotá-lo, ele obtém um item extremamente raro no valor de centenas de milhões, uma carta de Servo que pode convocar seres lendários!! Depois que ele se decide, ele a convoca, e uma donzela guerreira extremamente linda aparece. Supere sua posição como um simples Mob, Kaito! Uma nova fantasia moderna começa!

altTitles.ja: しゅがー・みーつ・がーる！

description.en:
A Sweet and Juicy Girls' Comedy~

Featuring:

Sato Kanna, daughter of a yakuza boss, she's known for being loyal to her friends and her slightly delinquent appearance.

And Mochizuki Mito, class president and the school's most envied upon young lady.

Just what unexpected secrets did these two girls found out about each other!?
description.es: Una dulce y jugosa comedia de chicas~ Presentación: Sato Kanna, hija de un jefe yakuza, es conocida por ser leal a sus amigos y por su aspecto ligeramente delincuente. Y Mochizuki Mito, presidenta de la clase y la joven más envidiada de la escuela. ¿Qué secretos inesperados habrán descubierto estas dos chicas la una sobre la otra?
description.es-la: Una dulce y jugosa comedia de chicas~ Presentación: Sato Kanna, hija de un jefe yakuza, es conocida por ser leal a sus amigos y por su aspecto ligeramente delincuente. Y Mochizuki Mito, presidenta de la clase y la joven más envidiada de la escuela. ¿Qué secretos inesperados habrán descubierto estas dos chicas la una sobre la otra?

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

description.en: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？

altTitles.en: How to train your brainrot girlfriend

altTitles.es-la: Tengo una novia con la percepción de la realidad alterada

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái bại não của tôi

description.en:
She's cute! She's beautiful! She's sexy! She... speaks in tongues? Meet the Brainrot Girlfriend! She means well, but good luck understanding what she says. 
Brainrot translation: shes skibidi shes toilet shes roblox she girl math goat bussing this better caul saul mrbeast metal pipe falling the roblox amogus she gigachad glazer but colleen ballinger nonchalant poppy playtime what she roblox L rn
description.tl: Ang cute niya! Ang ganda niya! Ang seksi niya! At siya ay... nagsasalita ng iba't ibang wika? Sa Vietnamese na manga na ito, kilalanin ang Jowang utakbulok! Mabuti ang kanyang intensyon, pero swerte na lang kung maiintindihan mo ang sinasabi niya.

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

description.en:
“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
description.pl:
Ponury i niegościnny świat po katastrofie ekologicznej. Spustoszoną ziemię bombarduje promieniowanie kosmiczne. Niedobitki ludzkości schroniły się w dwóch ostatnich ocalałych bazach, desperacko próbując przetrwać. Każdy kontakt z obcym organizmem żywym grozi skażeniem genetycznym.

Do bazy ludzi trafia zagubiony chłopak, który w rzeczywistości nie jest nawet człowiekiem. Los styka go z bezlitosnym sędzią, wyszkolonym do tropienia i likwidowania mutantów. Niespodziewanie ich znajomość przeradza się w coś więcej…

Polskie tłumaczenie powieści dostępne tutaj: https://www.wattpad.com/story/251281478-little-mushroom
